demoExpired.title: Demo Expired
demoExpired.canUpgrade: Thanks for trying the Sandstorm Demo! Your demo account has expired. If you'd like to continue using Sandstorm and make your data permanent, please sign in.
demoExpired.cannotUpgrade: Thanks for trying the Sandstorm Demo! Your demo account has expired.

demoModal.header: Sandstorm is a self-hostable web productivity suite.
demoModal.withoutAppDemo: with all the apps you need in one place.
demoModal.explanation: Sandstorm makes it easy to run apps on your own server. In addition to improving privacy and control, this brings Open Source apps to a wide audience.
demoModal.securityOverview: Sandstorm is also ridiculously secure. If security interests you, check out Sandstorm's security model overview.

signup.title: 要求邀請

signedUp.keyIsUsedWithOrigin: 註冊成功！來去下載應用程式吧。
signedUp.keyIsNotUsed: 您已經有帳號了，不需要這把註冊金鑰。

signup.keyIsUsed: 抱歉，這把註冊金鑰已經被用掉了。
signup.signInGuide: 您需要先登入。__First, you have to sign in. Click "Sign in" in the upper-right.
signup.invalidKey: 抱歉，這個註冊金鑰無效。

uploadTest.title: Upload test page
uploadTest.explanation: This page is intended for use by the test scripts.

isPaid.title: Get up to 30 GB of free space when your friends share on Oasis!
isPaid.explanation: For each friend that creates a sharing link, we'll reward you with 2 GB.

isNotPaid.title: Get unlimited grains & up to 2 GB of free space when your friends share on Oasis!
isNotPaid.explanation: For each friend that creates a sharing link, we'll reward you with 50 MB. You'll also get unlimited grains.

howTo.title: Sharing is referring
howTo.explanation: To get started, open any grain and click Share access.

getStart.step1: You share a grain with your friend (who isn't already an Oasis user).
getStart.step3: Your friend shares a grain with any other person (including you).

status.title: Your referrals & status
status.explanation: Once you send a sharing link out, people will appear in this list after they sign in.

pending.title: Still needs to share
pending.explanation: Tell these people to make a grain and share it with you. You must actually view the grain they shared with you!

success.title: Successful referrals
success.explanation: You've successfully referred these people. Congratulations!

finePrint.title: The fine print
finePrint.warningWithAccountLink: Your referral bonus lasts until 1 year after the referral. The terms of this referral program may change without warning; however, such changes will not affect bonuses you have already received. If you need even more space, upgrade your account.
finePrint.explanation: Paid subscribers can get up to 30 GB of free storage, 2 GB per person they refer, in addition to the storage from their account level. Free account holders can earn unlimited grains and 50 MB of free storage per person they refer, up to 2 GB total.

intro.explanation: 沙聚雲(Sandstorm.io)是可以執行私人或個人網路應用程式的開源平台。使用者可以上傳並安裝任何程式，就像手機的應用程式商店一樣。為了保護隱私，這是唯一公開開源網路應用程式的方式。
intro.unofficialWarning: WARNING: This server is running an unofficial build of Sandstorm which may contain modifications not reviewed by the developers.

corporate.title: 贊助者
corporate.explanation: These companies contributed heavily to Sandstorm's crowdfunding campaign.

individual.title: Key indivisual sponsors
individual.explanation: These individuals contributed heavily to Sandstorm's crowdfunding campaign.

dependencies.title: Third-party works used
dependencies.explanation: These works are copyright the respective authors and used under the terms of the respective licenses.

copyright.title: 著作權
copyright.license: The Sandstorm implementation is copyright by Sandstorm Development Group, Inc. and contributors. The implementation is licensed under the Apache License 2.0.
copyright.trademark: "Sandstorm" and the Sandstorm logo are trademarks of Sandstorm Development Group, Inc., and may not be used to advertise derivative works nor commercial services without written consent from Sandstorm Development Group, Inc.

emailInviteTab.demoModeAlert: Sharing emails cannot be sent while in demo mode. Create an account to send sharing emails, or get a shareable link instead.

styleguide.title: Sandstorm style guide
styleguide.note: (note: this is a work in progress.)

copyRules.title: Copy rules
copyRules.rule1: Be terse but clear.  Avoid technical terms where less-technical ones will do.
copyRules.rule2: Capitalize the first letter of the first word of a section heading or button.  Do not capitalize the second word, or anything else, unless referring to a proper noun like Google or GitHub.
copyRules.rule3: Use verbs for text on buttons. The button text should describe what clicking that button will do.
copyRules.rule4: Use nouns for text which is a link.  The link text should indicate what the link will take you to.
copyRules.rule5: Use nouns for basically everything else, too, to communicate the information architecture. Section headings should be nouns which describe the content of the section.  Labels should be nouns which describe the content of the field.

styleRules.title: Style rules
styleRules.rule1: Stick to a limited color palette.  (TODO: add specific colors)
styleRules.rule2: Use typefaces no smaller than 13px for text content.  Readability is important and not everyone has young eyes.
styleRules.rule3: Make click targets no smaller than 32px square or 26px tall if appreciably wider.  Remember that due to Fitts' Law, larger click targets are easier to interact with.

forms.title: Forms
forms.rule2: The primary action button of a form should be at the bottom right of the form. Secondary buttons should line up to the left of that primary action button.
forms.rule3: When providing text input fields, place labels above the input, not side-by-side or inside the field as placeholder text.  Place additional explanation or instructions below the input. Placeholder text should be used for examples, not instructions.
forms.rule4: Forms are generally used for transactional interactions, where the user cares about the success or failure of the application.  Avoid optimistic UI in favor of multi-state UI which communicates network activity, success, and failure.  A common pattern is:
forms.rule4-1: Have the default state of the form.  Disable a save button until the user makes a change.
forms.rule4-2: When the user clicks an action button, start the RPC, and disable the entire form to indicate that the action is underway.
forms.rule4-3: When the RPC completes, if the RPC failed, show an error message at the top of the context over which the action applies.  If the RPC succeeded, either indicate a success message (again, at the top of the context over which the action applies) or if this was a modal interaction and the completion of the RPC indicates successful completion of the workflow, dismiss the form with no additional message.

example.title: An example:
example.label: Email
example.subtext: You might want to receive notifications.

newAdmin.wildcardHostBroken: 警告：本伺服器似乎把 WILDCARD_HOST 設定錯了。在修復此問題前，您無法使用任何應用程式。您可以參照本篇沙聚雲文件和您瀏覽器的 Javascript 記錄取得更多資訊。您必須調整 DNS、SSL/TLS certificates，或編輯 sandstorm.conf 檔案。如果您想要測試問題是否已修復，請重新整理此頁面。如果您仍然有問題，請在此開一個 issue。
newAdmin.websocketBroken: 警告：本伺服器似乎無法建立 WebSocket。沙聚雲也許看起來沒有問題，但許多應用程式會無法正常執行。更多資訊在此。通常這是因為上層的 reverse proxy （比如 nginx 或 Apache）需要被重新設定。如果您認為不是，請重新整理此頁面或在此開一個 issue。
newAdmin.hasSetupToken: 您並非以管理者身份登入，但您的設置 token 是正確的。您現在可以啟動設置精靈或檢視系統記錄。
newAdmin.hasNoSetupToken: 您並非以管理者身份登入，無法使用管理面板。請以管理者身份登入，或在主機終端上執行`sandstorm admin-token`來取得管理 token。

newAdminIdentity.explanation: 選擇使用者可以用哪些方法進行身份認證。所有人都能登入，但只有您邀請的使用者可以安裝應用程式或建立沙粒。

adminIdentityProviderConfigureEmail.title: 電子郵件登入設定
adminIdentityProviderConfigureEmail.warning: 備註：若要使用電子郵件登入，您也需要設定伺服器的電子郵件寄送功能。
adminIdentityProviderConfigureEmail.explanation: 電子郵件登入沒有額外的設定選項。

googleLoginSetupInstructions.explanation: 首先，您需要取得 Google Client ID。遵循以下步驟：
googleLoginSetupInstructions.step2: __"Create Project", if needed. Wait for Google to finish provisioning.
googleLoginSetupInstructions.step3: __On the left sidebar, go to "Credentials" and, on the right, "OAuth consent screen". Make sure to enter an email address and a product name, and save.
googleLoginSetupInstructions.step4: __On the left sidebar, go to "Credentials".  Click the "Create credentials" button, then select "OAuth client ID" as the type.

adminIdentityProviderConfigureGoogle.title: __Google login configuration
adminIdentityProviderConfigureGoogle.formerBaseUrlWarning: __This server moved from __former__ to __current__. You'll need to visit https://console.developers.google.com/ and update the "Authorized Javascript Origins" and "Authorized Redirect URI" for this Client ID to include the values below.
adminIdentityProviderConfigureGoogle.explanation: __Then, copy over your Client ID and Client secret below:

githubLoginSetupInstructions.explanation: __First, you'll need to get a Github Client ID and Client secret. Follow these steps:

adminIdentityProviderConfigureGitHub.title: __GitHub login configuration
adminIdentityProviderConfigureGitHub.formerBaseUrlWarning: __This server moved from __former__ to __current__. You'll need to visit https://github.com/settings/developers and update the Homepage URL and Authorization callback URL for this application to the values below.
adminIdentityProviderConfigureGitHub.explanation: __Then, copy over your Client ID and Client secret below:

searchBindDn.label: __Bind user DN
searchBindDn.subtext: __The DN to bind as when searching for a user in the tree, e.g. cn=admin,ou=users,dc=example,dc=com. Optional, but needed if your server doesn't allow unauthenticated searches.

searchBindPassword.label: __Bind user password
searchBindPassword.subtext: __Optional, needed if specifying bind DN above.

base.label: __Base DN
base.subtext: __The root object under which to search for user account nodes, e.g. ou=users,dc=example,dc=com

searchUsername.label: __LDAP username attribute
searchUsername.subtext: __The LDAP attribute on a user object which represents the user's username (what they will enter in the username field when signing in).

nameField.label: __LDAP given name attribute
nameField.subtext: __The LDAP attribute on a user object which represents the user's full display name.

emailField.label: __LDAP email attribute
emailField.subtext: __The LDAP attribute on a user object which represents the user's email address.

filter.label: __Additional LDAP filter criteria
filter.subtext: __An optional LDAP query fragment that will be included in the user search. This is not commonly used. See RFC2254.

caCert.label: __LDAP CA certificate
caCert.subtext: __This is only necessary if your server supports SSL and is using a private CA not in the common trusted set. Note that it does NOT work to enter the LDAP server's own certificate here -- it must be the certificate of a CA which has signed the LDAP server's certificate.

adminIdentityProviderConfigureSaml.title: __SAML login configuration
adminIdentityProviderConfigureSaml.explanation: __Your SAML IDP should be configured to return a persistent nameID. In addition, if you are not using Active Directory, you must configure your IDP to provide two extra attributes, email and displayName.
adminIdentityProviderConfigureSaml.serviceUrl: __The Service URL of this server is: %s
adminIdentityProviderConfigureSaml.logoutUrl: __The Service Logout URL of this server is: %s
adminIdentityProviderConfigureSaml.metadataUrlAt: __If your SAML IDP supports reading the service provider metadata from a URL, then you can point it at: __text__

organizationSettingsBlurb.explanation: __Sandstorm allows you to define an organization. You can automatically apply some settings to all members of your organization. Users within the organization will automatically be able to log in, install apps, and create grains.

emailToggle.label: __Users authenticated via email address
emailToggle.subtext: __Note: disabled because email login is not configured.

emailDomain.label: __Domain:
emailDomain.subtext: __Users with an email address at this domain will be members of this server's organization.

gappsToggle.label: __Users authenticated via Google Apps for Work
gappsToggle.subtext: __Note: disabled because Google login is not configured.

gappsDomain.label: __Domain:
gappsDomain.subtext: __Users with a Google Apps for Work account under this domain will be members of this server's organization.

ldapToggle.label: __Users authenticated via LDAP
ldapToggle.subtext: __Note: disabled because LDAP login is not configured.

samlToggle.label: __Users authenticated via SAML
samlToggle.subtext: __Note: disabled because SAML login is not configured.

disallowGuests.label: __Disallow collaboration with users outside the organization.
disallowGuests.subtext: __Users will be required to log in as a member of your organization to view sharing links. Guest access will be disabled.

shareContacts.label: __Make all organization users visible to each other
shareContacts.subtext: __This setting automatically adds users within the organization to each other's contact list so that they can share grains with each other.  Disable this if you have some users whose identity should stay hidden from other users.

outbound.title: __Outbound email
outbound.warning: __Email is unconfigured. Email-related features like email login, notifications, sharing by identity, and requesting access will be unavailable until you configure email.

howItWorks.title: __How Sandstorm uses email
howItWorks.explanation: __Sandstorm sends email notifications, and Sandstorm apps can send email notifications, too. Every app receives a unique email address, so Sandstorm needs to send email from a variety of "From:" addresses. Therefore, Gmail SMTP won't work, but there are other free services. See more info in the docs.

address.subtext: __Use port 25 for SMTP (unencrypted or with StartTLS), port 465 for TLS-encrypted SMTPS.

returnAddress.label: __Sandstorm server's own email address
returnAddress.subtext: __Sandstorm will send login emails, notifications of granted access requests, and other emails from this address. It will also use this address in the SMTP envelope.

emailDisablePopup.title: __Really disable email?
emailDisablePopup.explanation: __This will disable all outbound email delivery for this server, including sharing via email, email token login (if enabled), and email notifications to users.

serverTitle.label: __Server title:
serverTitle.subtext: __The name of this server, as used when communicating with users.

splashUrl.label: __Splash URL (experimental):
splashUrl.subtext: __This web page will be displayed in the background behind the login dialog (the home page when logged out). For security reasons, the page must be hosted within this Sandstorm server's wildcard host (otherwise it will be blocked by Content-Security-Policy). We suggest using a static web publishing app like Hacker CMS to host content.WARNING: This feature is experimental; in particular the style and positioning of the login box is subject to change without notice. Please let us know if you'd like to see it stabilize.

signupDialog.label: __Signup dialog:
signupDialog.subtext: __This text will be displayed to users who click on signup links.

termsOfService.label: __Terms of service URL:
termsOfService.subtext: __If provided, new users will be required to agree to the linked terms of service.

privacyPolicy.label: __Privacy policy URL:
privacyPolicy.subtext: __If provided, new users will be required to agree to the linked privacy policy.

useServerTitleForHomeText.label: __Use server title (above) for home link
useServerTitleForHomeText.subtext: __If enabled, changes the default label "Sandstorm" on the link at the very top left to match whatever you specified for the Server title above.

customLoginProviderName.label: __Custom login button text
customLoginProviderName.subtext: __Replaces the text "with LDAP" and "with SAML" on the login page with the specified text.

newAdminPreinstalledApps.explanation: __Apps you configure on this page to be pre-installed will automatically be installed (show under /apps) for new users.

productivitySuite.label: __Productivity Suite
productivitySuite.subtext: __We recommend pre-installing these core apps that are useful to most users.

systemSuite.label: __System apps
systemSuite.subtext: __We recommend pre-installing these system apps that greatly enhance the abilities of Sandstorm.

allApps.label: __All apps on market
allApps.subtext: __The checked apps below will be installed by default for all new users.

appMarketUrl.label: __App market URL
appMarketUrl.subtext: __The "Install..." button on the Apps page will link to this URL.

enableAppUpdates.label: __Enable app update notifications
enableAppUpdates.subtext: __Updates to apps will be automatically downloaded by the Sandstorm server daily and notifications sent to users asking if they want to update their installed apps.

appIndexUrl.label: __App index URL
appIndexUrl.subtext: __This is the URL that the Sandstorm server will check to learn about app updates.

ipBlacklist.label: __Server-side request IP blacklist:
ipBlacklist.subtext: __Users will be prohibited from making requests to these IP addresses. This includes making a request from an app, downloading an SPK file from a user-provided URL, etc. You may specify one IP address or network (in CIDR notation, e.g. "127.0.0.0/8") per line. The default value includes standard local and private network addresses. Note that when an HTTP proxy is in use, this setting may be ignored; the proxy must implement its own blacklist.

admin.label: __Admin
admin.explanation: __Manages all accounts.  Can install apps, create grains, and administer the server.

visitor.label: __Visitor
visitor.explanation: __Can use and re-share shared grains, but cannot create grains of their own nor install apps.

deletePopup.title: __Delete %s
deletePopup.explanation: __You are about to mark %s's account for deletion. Once marked for deletion, this account will be suspended, and admins will have 7 days to cancel the pending deletion by returning to this page and clicking the "Unsuspend Account" button. %s will not be able to stop this suspension/deletion.
deletePopup.detail: __After 7 days, %s's account will be permanently deleted. Deleting this account will:
deletePopup.detail4: __Delete all identities owned by this account (except identities also associated with another account).

suspendPopup.title: __Suspend %s
suspendPopup.detail1: __Prevent any grains created by %s from being opened
suspendPopup.detail3: __This also applies to all identities owned by this account (except identities associated with another account)

appList.noMatchApp: 找不到名稱含有該字串的應用程式。請試試搜尋市集 »
appList.unauthorizedText: 只有管理者給予權限的的使用者才能安裝應用程式。若需權限，請聯絡管理者。
